thread.title: BUZZ-Playtech: jumps on short-term recommendation from MS
thread.title_full: BUZZ-Playtech: jumps on short-term recommendation from MS

title: BUZZ-Playtech: jumps on short-term recommendation from MS
text:
5.30 +0.097 
** Online gaming co Playtech (LSE: PTEC.L - news ) up c.5 pct, top FTSE-250 riser in robust volume 
** Traders cite short-term trade recommendation from Morgan Stanley on the stock 
** Morgan Stanley (Xetra: 885836 - news ) , who has a "Buy" rating on Playtech with PT of 1030p, expect strong double-digit revenue growth to continue into Q2 
** "We believe the share price will rise relative to the industry over the next 60 days," MS says 
** Company will report H1 results on Aug 27 
** On Aug. 19, shareholders will vote on the proposed acquisition of Plus500 (Stuttgart: P55.SG - news ) and Ava Trade 
** Broker estimates that completion of both transactions would enhance EPS by c.40 pct in 2016 
** Another trader says Playtech is getting preference over bookmaker Ladbrokes (LSE: LAD.L - news ) , downgraded by Jefferies and HSBC on Thursday 
** Jefferies cuts Ladbrokes' rating to "underperform" from "hold", PT at 90p vs 110p while HSBC cuts PT to 110p from 125p
